xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/203824-Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.: A Historical Perspective 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ww22v0pUAK5n48gyyvjXqkGSFzE.jpg Documentary film focuses on the Civil Rights leader's many groundbreaking accomplishments. Footage covers Dr. King's war on poverty and his staunch opposition to the Vietnam War. Also included is his stirring "I Have a Dream" speech. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.: A Historical Perspective
